import {useState} from 'react' import './Transact.css' import transactBackground from '../../../../imgs/tabs.jpg' const Transact = () => { const [transaction, setTransaction] = useState( { amount: 0, description: 'test', transactionId: 1, date: '1/1/2000', type: 'credit' } ) function handleChange(event) { setTransaction } return (
) } export default Transact
